attributes.action: legalise all drugs including heroin and cocaine
attributes.additional_details:
The advantages of legalising all drugs far outweigh the disadvantages. Crime would be dramatically reduced and using drugs would be deglamourised.
Guns are used to enforce dealers boundaries and to punish their debtors.
Money saved from prosecuting users and dealers could be used to provide more rehab facilities.
The resistance to decriminalisation is partly misplaced morality and partly the lack of political guts.
